verses.verse: Now after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> it came to pass, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> ' minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> is dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; now therefore arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, thou, and all this people <S%H5971><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I do give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to them, even to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Havahry place <S%H4725><s%> that the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread upon <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto you, as I said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

From the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and this Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>, all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and unto the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, shall be your coast <S%H1366><s%>.

There shall not any man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee all the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy life <S%H2416><s%>: as I was with Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so I will be with thee: I will not fail <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, nor forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: for unto this people <S%H5971><s%> shalt thou divide for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them.

Only be thou strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, that thou mayest observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> according to all the Torah <S%H8451><s%>, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee: turn <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not from it to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>, that thou mayest prosper <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8686><s%> whithersoever thou goest <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

This book <S%H5612><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>; but thou shalt meditate <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>, that thou mayest observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> therein: for then thou shalt make <S%H6743><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> prosperous <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and then thou shalt have good success <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

Have not I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee? Be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; be not afraid <S%H6206><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither be thou dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is with thee whithersoever thou goest <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Then Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the officers <S%H7860><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>, and command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8685><s%> you victuals <S%H6720><s%>; for within three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ye shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> this Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, to go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

And to the Re'uvenites <S%H7206><s%>, and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and to half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath given you rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, and hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you this land <S%H776><s%>.

Your wives <S%H802><s%>, your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and your cattle <S%H4735><s%>, shall remain <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you on this side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>; but ye shall pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%>, all the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valour <S%H2428><s%>, and help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them;

Until the YY <S%H3068><s%> have given <S%H5117><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them: then ye shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H3425><s%>, and enjoy <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you on this side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%>.

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, All that thou commandest <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> us we will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and whithersoever <S%H834><s%> thou sendest <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> us, we will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

According as we hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in all things, so will we hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee: only the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> be with thee, as he was with Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

Whosoever <S%H376><s%> he be that doth rebel <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8686><s%> against thy Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%>, and will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thy words <S%H1697><s%> in all that thou commandest <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, he shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%>: only be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.
